title: Segment Summary
description: A collection of Data Elements. Used in Companion Guides to define a Transaction Set.

pos.description: Indicates the order in which Segments should appear in their Level of the Transaction Set.

purpose.description: Documents the purpose of a Segment.

max_use.description: Number of times a particular Segment may be repeated at its location in the Transaction Set.

usage.description: Indicates whether or not the Segment must be used; Somewhat redundant due to `Req`.

loop.description: Loop in which the Segment appears.

element_count.description: Number of Data Elements included in the Segment.

req.description: Defines if/how the Segment is required.

level.description: Indicates where the Segment is located in the Transaction Set.

elements.description: Data Elements that comprise the Segment.
